English.Text: Their faith cannot prepare them for this. Her head suddenly spins on its axis, its face not young and pale as in the mirror, but shrunken and grey— a thousand-years old!— it's empty eyeholes seething with a colony of larvae! The sailors run. Rushing through the dark dark halls, trampling the rickety stairs, and out into the rain. Finding the portcullis raised, they rush for the beyond; a lifetime of insomnia.
